subject: Football
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. and its players union met in Washington for the second consecutive day in front of a federal mediator, an attempt to get negotiations going with less than two weeks until their labor contract expires.
snippet: The N.F.L. and its players union met in Washington for the second consecutive day in front of a federal mediator, an attempt to get negotiations going with less than two weeks until their labor contract expires.
